name: Wrecking Ball Rush
description:
Can you wreck the wall first? Tap and hold to swing. Choose your object and race against opponents in this action packed swinging game! Be careful not to wreck yourself first!.

Wrecking Ball Rush Features:

- Simple Gameplay!
- Fast-paced swinging action!
- Race against opponents!
- Earn money and buy new playable objects!
- No IAP - Wrecking Ball Rush is a full game from the moment you download!
